dict.string: We use this data to provide personalized content and ads.
Yump driver requires camera access to enable users to upload profile pictures and to scan documents for ride verification purposes.
Yump driver needs access to your location to provide accurate ride matching, real-time tracking, and location-based services, ensuring a seamless ride experience.

Yump driver uses your location even when the app is not in use to improve ride tracking, ensure accurate pick-up and drop-off points, and provide location-based features like ride history and notifications.
Yump driver requires your location while the app is in use to provide real-time ride updates, accurate navigation, and ensure a smooth ride experience.
Yump driver uses the microphone to enable voice communication between riders and drivers for enhanced safety and convenience during rides.
Yump driver needs access to your photo library to allow users to upload images for profile customization and document verification for ride security.
Yump driver requires access to your photo library to enable uploading of profile pictures and to facilitate document uploads for ride verification and enhanced user profile features.
